member.name: T:NAnt.MSBuild.Functions.MSBuildFunctions
member.summary: Functions to return information for MSBuild system.

member.name: M:NAnt.MSBuild.Functions.MSBuildFunctions.IsMsbuildProject(System.String)
member.summary: Test whether project is VS2005 project and could be built using <msbuild>
member.param: The name or path of the project file (csproj, vbproj, ...).
member.returns: True, if it is msbuild project, False otherwise.

member.name: M:NAnt.MSBuild.NAntLogger.Initialize(Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource)
member.summary: Initialize is guaranteed to be called by MSBuild at the start of the build before any events are raised.
